scenarios.title: Dawn Corridor – Coordinated shard surge
scenarios.summary: Blend narrative assets with automated shard expansion during peak diplomacy workload.
steps: Launch npm run mission-control:ops deploy -- --network sepolia to stage the surge sandbox.
Stream marketplace negotiation script for Saffron-Halo and Graphite-Spark pairings.
Capture climax metrics and annotate the storytelling timeline via docs/orchestration/scenarios/superintelligence-playbook.md#dawn-corridor.

scenarios.title: Aurora Whisper – Rapid policy harmonization
scenarios.summary: Use the policy CLI wrapper to synchronize sentiment guardrails without interrupting creative throughput.
steps: Dry-run new policy bundle with npm run mission-control:ops -- policy apply --file policies/aurora-whisper.yaml --dry-run.
Narrate the ethics sentinel review and capture transcript in the operations log.
Commit the upgrade timestamp for the council briefing kit.

tip: Pair this dashboard with the mission control CLI npm run mission-control:ops -- --help and the non-technical tutorial under docs/orchestration/mission-control-tutorial.md for an end-to-end command center.
